turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Islam in the Gambia.
turn.1: What is important about the Gambian religious landscape?
turn.2: Islam in the Gambia Islam is the majority religion of the Gambia, with around 95% of the population being Muslims.
turn.3: Do other religions practiced in the country?
turn.4: Other religious societies are made up of Catholics, Protestants, and Traditional African religion.
turn.5: Is there any other interesting information I should know?
turn.6: Islam in the Gambia is characterized by its coexistence with other religions.
turn.8: The majority of its Muslims are Sunni belonging to Maliki school of jurisprudence, influenced with Sufism.
turn.9: Do any other groups practice the religion too?
turn.10: The Ahmadiyya movement is also present.
turn.11: Are there any other religious practices?
turn.12: However, some popular religious and tribal practices diverge from mainstream Islam, with a system of marabout societies being very common.
